title: Intern – Front-end Developer
summary: Collaborated on two Android projects: an attendance checking app and an alcohol testing app using a Bluetooth breathalyzer.
Developed and maintained front-end features using Kotlin in Android Studio to build responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
Joined weekly meetings to test, debug, and confirm changes before release.

slides.title: Device Dashboard
slides.text: Implemented responsive layout for device status, test history, and quick actions, focusing on clarity for field operators.

slides.title: Testing Workflow
slides.text: Helped refine the step-by-step testing flow so users can complete a breathalyzer test with minimal confusion.

title: Laboratory Appointment Booking App
summary: Built a cross-platform mobile app in Flutter with Firebase as the backend.
Implemented appointment scheduling, patient data storage, and secure authentication.
Worked in a team following the full SDLC: requirements, design, implementation, and testing.

slides.title: Login & Authentication
slides.text: Designed a simple Firebase-based login screen so patients can safely access their appointment data.

slides.title: Booking Screen
slides.text: Created the booking interface with date/time picker, validation, and feedback for successful bookings.

slides.title: Appointment History
slides.text: Displays upcoming and completed appointments pulled from Firestore, similar to real healthcare apps.

title: Mobile App Developer (Project: WORDY)
summary: Designed and built a word guessing game app in Android Studio using Kotlin.
Implemented custom UI components, level-based gameplay, and SQLite for saving player progress.
Optimized performance and refined UX, managing the full app development lifecycle from prototype to release.

slides.title: Home & Mode Selection
slides.text: Players can choose between Level mode and Time Race, each with its own UI and difficulty progression.

slides.title: Gameplay Screen
slides.text: Letter grid, hints, and animations are all custom-built; the layout adapts for long words and idioms.
